title: Westlife's Mark Feehily shows newborn daughter Layla in My Blood video
text:
Westlife have released their powerful new video for their song My Blood, with Mark Feehily offering fans their first glimpse of his daughter Layla.

The star welcomed the little one with his fiance Cailean O’Neill on 3 October, with the proud dads sharing the sweetest photo to share that she’d been born.

The video for My Blood shows Mark joined by his bandmates – Shane Filan, Kian Egan, and Nicky Byrne – as they show off their kids.

It features an adorable home video of Mark and his baby daughter, filmed by Cailean.

Mark showed off his little one (Picture: Westlife)

So sweet!

All of Westlife’s children appear in the video including Nicole Filan (14), Patrick Filan (11), Shane Filan Jr (9), Koa Egan (7), Zekey Egan (4), Cobi Egan (2), Rocco Byrne (12), Jay Byrne (12), Gia Byrne (6) and Layla, who is less than a month old.

Safe to say, the lads are a bit outnumbered.

Written by Ed Sheeran and Steve Mac, it’s everything you’d want from a Westlife ballad and we’re already obsessed.

‘My Blood has such beautiful lyrics. It is a powerful, heartfelt song which has such a strong meaning for all of us,’ the band, who recently opened up about their split, said. ‘The single reflects where we are at this time in our lives – raising children and starting families.

‘This is our fourth single that has been co-written by Ed Sheeran and Steve Mac. It has been brilliant to work with them. My Blood is the prefect lead into our upcoming album Spectrum.’

Just a bunch of proud dads (Picture: Westlife)

Basically, they’re all grown up.

Mark and Cailean welcomed their first child earlier this month after getting engaged back in February.

Cool dad alert (Picture: Westlife)

An adorable photo at the hospital ward saw Mark, 39 and his partner holding onto the trolley where their baby Layla lay, bundled up in blankets.

Meanwhile, her proud dads held their index fingers in the air.

Mark wrote: ‘Baby Layla born safe & sound @ 7.27pm on October 1st 2019! We’re the happiest Dads in the world!’

The pair have been low-key about their romance and private lives, with Cailean largely staying out of the spotlight, but fans will be thrilled with the adorable glimpses of the little one.
